```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(dplyr)  # For data manipulation

# Compare the genre columns from both datasets

modified_spotify_data<- read.csv("./data/modified_spotify_data.csv")
spotify_dataset_modified <- read.csv("./data/spotify_dataset_modified.csv")

table(modified_spotify_data$genre)
table(spotify_dataset_modified$genre)

# View unique genres in both datasets
unique(modified_spotify_data$genre)
unique(spotify_dataset_modified$genre)
```
